entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having a family with a long history of witches and warlocks.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is also a witch, mentioned as having a pure bloodline.

entities.name: madam pince
entities.description: The librarian at Hogwarts, mentioned as giving Harry a reproving glare.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's Muggle relatives who he lives with and hates.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Non-magical people, mentioned as being hated by Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, also known as 'Harry'.

relationships.description: Ernie is a friend of Harry's, mentioned as having a conversation with him.
Madam Pince is in authority over Harry, mentioned as giving him a reproving glare.
The Dursleys are Harry's Muggle relatives who he lives with and hates.
